title: Mexico Says Five Missing Staff From Canadian Miner Are Dead
description: Mexican authorities said at least five workers from Canada’s Vizsla Silver Corp. have been found dead, after 10 people were abducted from the company’s Panuco project east of the Pacific Coast city of Mazatlan last month.
content: Mexican authorities said at least five workers from Canada’s Vizsla Silver Corp. have been found dead, after 10 people were abducted from the company’s Panuco project east of the Pacific Coast city of Mazatlan last month.
